DOC.brief_summary: The sensory motor perception threshold influence therapeutic effect Transcutaneous Electrical Nerve Stimulation . This study aim determine threshold sensory perception threshold motor response young elderly subject sex . Eighty healthy volunteer evaluate ; 40 woman 40 men divide two equal group young elderly subject . Half individual group stimulate 5 50Hz frequency , pulse duration 20 , 100 , 400 , 1000 3000Âµs apply flexor muscle belly wrist finger . The threshold sensory perception identify first sensation increase current intensity threshold motor response minimum muscle contraction detect . The result submit ANOVA test , follow Tukey test , significance level 5 % .
DOC.brief_title: Analysis Sensory Motor Thresholds During Transcutaneous Electrical Stimulation Different Sexes Ages
DOC.criteria: healthy individual present : previous circulatory , nervous metabolic disease , metal implant area study ; fracture upper limb study ; history pain injury area study . menstrual period week making use drug affect nervous system
